title: 421: CHATTY BROS: Bachelorette Bro-cap (Ep. 1 - The Premiere!)
itunes:title: 421: CHATTY BROS: Bachelorette Bro-cap (Ep. 1 - The Premiere!)
description:
The Bros have come together for their first Bro-cap (aka a recap that is all over the place and tangential plus drinks) of Gabby and Rachel’s Bachelorette season! Plus they do a little Plug Somethin’!

PLUG SOMETHIN’:

***Rustica Handmade Chalk Bags: shop - https://www.etsy.com/shop/RusticaHandmade instagram - https://www.instagram.com/rustica_handmade/

***Anchor & Hope Wine: shop - https://anchorhopewine.com/pages/findwines instagram - https://www.instagram.com/anchorhopewine/

***FIRST PERSON: Get 15% off your first order by going to GETFIRSTPERSON.COM and using code CHATTY
